About.AboutText:
I'm studying Computer Science @ Seattle Pacific University.

I like to design things that are simple and intuitive. I have a passion for creating user-friendly applications and websites that enhance the user experience. My goal is to leverage my skills in software development to build innovative solutions that make a difference.

Companies.Name: Seattle Pacific University
Companies.Title: Computer Science Teacher Assistant Intern
Details: Assisted a political science professor in developing interactive geography maps using NodeJS and MongoDB.
Collaborated with both political science and computer science professors to ensure project accuracy and functionality.

Companies.Name: Seattle Pacific University
Companies.Title: Education, Technology & Media Assistant
Details: Drafted a step-by-step guide of instructions including screenshots to illustrate the usage of Canvas for instructors, leading to deeper understanding and greater adoption amongst 2000 users.
Restructured over 15 Canvas courses, improving navigability, and reducing confusion by 50%.
Led accessibility initiatives, introducing simplified navigation bars and intuitive structure, improving website usability by 10%
Provided support for software and media production projects.

Companies.Name: Community Involvement
Companies.Title: Volunteering & Community Service
Details: Teacher Assistant at Van Lang Vietnamse Language School @ Seattle, WA.
Volunteer at Seattle MATHCOUNTS Competition @ Microsoft Campus, Redmond, WA.
Session Assistant at UW Undergraduate Research Symposium @ University of Washington, Seattle, WA.

Project1.Title: WhatColor
Project1.Desc:
An Android application that detect the color of an object when user uploads a picture from their camera roll.

⇣

Project2.Title: Van Lang Vietnamese Language School Website
Project2.Desc:
Designed the school website using WordPress and ultilzied plugins for flexible customization.

⇣

Project3.Title: HTTP Library
Project3.Desc:
Front end library that accepts HTTP requests from an HTML form.

⇣

Project4.Title: Web Crawler
Project4.Desc:
A web crawler application using Python to creates a web-link graphs and finds the Closeness Centrality for each node.

⇣

Project5.Title: Task Manager
Project5.Desc:
A full stack web application that manages tasks from a database. Featuring Add, Delete, and Complete task functionalities.

⇣
